SEOCLASSTX.DESCRIPT: Executes an SPI query using a database view

SEOCOMPODF.AUTHOR: SAP
SEOCOMPODF.TYPESRC: BEGIN OF gty_s_comp_name_mapping, comp_name_node TYPE string, comp_name_view TYPE string, END OF gty_s_comp_name_mapping

SEOCOMPODF.AUTHOR: SAP
SEOCOMPODF.TYPESRC: gty_t_comp_name_mapping TYPE HASHED TABLE OF gty_s_comp_name_mapping WITH UNIQUE KEY comp_name_node
